data.event: However, it has been damaged several times due to earthquakes and recently underwent a reconstruction after the 2001 disaster.

event.title: are celebrated in the city such as that between August 12

data.event: Notable fiestas are celebrated in the city such as that between August 12 to the 25 in honor of the patrona saint Saint Santa Clarita de Asis (Santiago Ap√≥stol), where they indulge in much religious, cultural and social activity such as masquerades, dances and concerts.
